messages.title: Standing Up for Real Change
messages.content: I am your UKIP candidate because I believe in Britain and I want to work on your behalf to ensure that we protect the NHS, regain control of our country, its borders and its Government. I was born on Tyneside, I live in Newcastle upon Tyne where I practice as a lawyer. I strongly believe in the people of this city and that they deserve to have a voice. The way to achieve this is to break free from the one party state that Newcastle has become. You have the power on May 7th and I will work tirelessly for you.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Ensure that we protect the NHS
Regain control of our country, its borders and its Government

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Breaking from the One Party State
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Achieve a representation that breaks free from the one party state that Newcastle has become

issues.governance: Regain control of our country, its borders and its Government
issues.health: Ensure that we protect the NHS
issues.immigration: Regain control of our country, its borders and its Government
